skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Confine
skill.description:
To confine a population into a set of given populated area.
When several populated areas should be visited to confine the population into, the agent confines each area by following the order of the elements into the 'populatedAreas' list.
If the visited area does not contain population, the confinement is not effective.

parameter.name: populatedAreas
parameter.description: An ordered list of a populated areas in which a population can be confined.

link.name: reach
link.description: To move to the populated area to confine.

link.name: confine
link.description: To activate the confinement of the population.

feedback.name: confined
feedback.description: Sent when a population is effectively confined into a populated area.

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The populated area in which the population is confined.

feedback.name: notConfined
feedback.description: Sent each time a 'PopulatedArea' cannot be confined.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all 'populatedAreas' have been visited, even of once of them haven't been alerted.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "populatedAreas" is empty (no element to act on).
